sentences.en: A structurally differentiated form of an element that exhibits allotropy.
sentences.cn: 化学元素的结构分化形式.

sentences.en: All are structurally similar to chlorophyll a of plants.
sentences.cn: 它们的结构都与植物体叶绿素a的结构相似.
安那托利亚 的地形结构很复杂.

sentences.en: For instance, some of the novels appear to be structurally diffuse.
sentences.cn: 例如, 某些小说在结构上看口罗冗长.

sentences.en: In this case, the FBML may be structurally correct, but the data is wrong.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，FBML在结构上是正确的，但是数据是错误的。

sentences.en: In this view , Creoles are developmentally and structurally exceptional languages.
sentences.cn: 这点来说, 克理奥尔语是发展上和结构上特殊的语言.

sentences.en: Now the high-level picture is at least structurally complete, and looks like  Figure 4.
sentences.cn: 现在，这个高层次的图至少在结构上是完整的了，如  图 4 所示。

sentences.en: Some English sentences are structurally attributive clauses but logically adverbial ones.
sentences.cn: 在英语中,有些从句从语法结构上看是定语从句,但跟主句在逻辑上却有状语的关系.

sentences.en: Structurally, RNA is a single - stranded structure.
sentences.cn: 从结构来看, RNA是 单链 结构.

sentences.en: That means share sales are structurally higher than outright purchases.
sentences.cn: 这意味着从结构上来说,售出股票的数量要超过直接购买的数量.
这建筑物在结构上很牢固.
那个教堂的结构很不坚固。

sentences.en: The house roof was ( structurally ) unsound.
sentences.cn: 这屋顶 ( 结构 ) 不牢固.

sentences.en: The structurally of the film's structure becomes the theme of the film.
sentences.cn: 此片的结构之结构性,成为此片唯一且最重要的主题.

sentences.en: This produces the following SQL statement which is structurally complete but with invalid syntax.
sentences.cn: 这会产生以下 SQL 语句，它在结构上是完整的，但是语法是无效的。

sentences.en: Tile: Thin, flat slab or Block used structurally or decoratively in Building.
sentences.cn: 瓦(砖): 薄而扁平的板或砌块,用作建筑的结构材料或装饰材料.

sentences.en: When we bought the house, it was structurally sound, but I decided to redecorate throughout.
sentences.cn: 我们买下这幢房子时，房子的格局不错，但我还是决定全部重新装修。

sentences.en: When we bought the house, it was structurally sound.
sentences.cn: 我们买下这栋房子的时候，它的结构还非常坚固。

words.tran_cn: 组织；构成（structure的过去分词）；建造
